hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Urwah bin Al-Mughirah that he heard his father say:"I poured water for the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) when he performed Wudu' during the battle of Tabuk, and he wiped over his Khuff

chapter.ara-name: باب صَبِّ الْخَادِمِ الْمَاءَ عَلَى الرَّجُلِ لِلْوُضُوءِ
chapter.eng-name: A Servant Pouring Water For A Man For Wudu'
